articles.author: Aditya Bhattacharya
articles.title: 'If Virat Kohli has decided to sit at home…': Dale Steyn's 'priority' talk - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former South Africa pacer Dale Steyn has reacted to Virat Kohli's absence as the India star is set to miss the entire Test series against England. | Cricket
articles.content: The biggest ongoing story in Indian cricket is Virat Kohli's absence, and Dale Steyn, one of his fiercest rivals on the field, has backed and respected the star India cricketer's decision to spend ti… [+5209 chars]
